appDesc.message: The Neural Nexus for Your Second Brain.

red_zone_1.message: Shall we pause for a moment?

red_zone_2.message: Your eyes seem a bit tired...

red_zone_3.message: Can we take a short silence together?

red_zone_4.message: You've worked hard, take a deep breath.

red_zone_5.message: I'm here with you. Let's rest for 10 seconds.

red_zone_6.message: The world can wait, but you need rest.

journal_ai_disabled.message: AI reply is turned off in Settings.

journal_ai_error.message: Amo is pondering, please try again later!

opt_hero_desc.message: AmoNexus uses Google Gemini to chat and provide psychological advice. Connect your own Key for free & private use.

opt_guide_1.message: Click the green button above to open Google AI Studio.

opt_guide_2.message: Log in with Gmail, click Get API key (Left menu).

opt_guide_3.message: Select Create API key in new project.

opt_guide_4.message: Copy the code (starts with AIza...) and paste it below.

opt_lang_desc.message: Match browser UI language or override per extension.

opt_provider_hint.message: OpenRouter: Access Llama 3, Mistral, DeepSeek (~50 free requests/day)

opt_semantic_section_desc.message: Find related highlights by meaning, not just recency.

opt_semantic_cost_warning.message: Warning: May increase Gemini API usage and latency.

opt_semantic_key_required.message: Add your API key to enable these toggles.

opt_semantic_embeddings_desc.message: Creates a semantic fingerprint for each highlight.

opt_semantic_search_desc.message: Uses embeddings to pick top related highlights in the same domain.

opt_ai_pilot_mode_hint.message: Shadow: observation only. Assist: suggestions. Primary: autonomous action.

opt_user_persona_desc.message: AI will adapt explanations to fit your expertise.

opt_nlm_enable_desc.message: Copy clip and open NotebookLM for manual paste

opt_nlm_mode_hint.message: UI-Assisted: copies to clipboard + opens NotebookLM for manual paste

opt_nlm_allow_cloud_desc.message: Allow sending Amo Clip to NotebookLM

offline_quote_1.message: Take a deep breath. The world can wait.

offline_quote_2.message: A small pause will help you go further.

offline_quote_3.message: Sometimes, doing nothing is the best thing to do right now.

offline_quote_4.message: You've worked hard, relax your shoulders a bit.

offline_quote_5.message: Have a sip of water and look into the distance?

sidepanel_welcome.message: Ask Amo anything about this page

sidepanel_welcome_desc.message: I've read the page content. Ask me to summarize, explain, or answer questions.

popup_confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to DELETE ALL machine learning data and history? This cannot be undone.

jnl_empty_desc.message: Try journaling when Amo asks you!

ai_thinking_error.message: ATOM is pondering, please try again later!

opt_debug_enable_desc.message: Show detailed logs in browser console

bug_subheader.message: Help us improve ATOM by describing what went wrong

bug_success.message: ‚úÖ GitHub opened! Please click 'Submit new issue' to complete.

bug_footer.message: Your report will be submitted as a GitHub Issue.

update_desc.message: Click here to install the official version for automatic updates.

bug_guide_title.message: üìñ How to fill this form (click to expand)

bug_guide_type_desc.message: Choose the category that best describes your issue.

bug_guide_summary_desc.message: Write a short, clear title (e.g., "Intervention not showing on YouTube").

bug_guide_steps_desc.message: List the exact steps to trigger the bug. Be specific!

bug_guide_expected_desc.message: Explain what you expected to happen and what actually happened.

bug_guide_tip.message: Keep "Include debug data" checked - it helps us fix bugs faster!

ctx_whitelist_domain.message: ATOM: Always ignore this site (Safe Zone)

nlm_pii_desc.message: This clip may contain sensitive information. Export anyway?

nlm_idea_desc.message: You seem to be collecting ideas around this topic.

reading_error_summary.message: ATOM hit an error analyzing this selection. Please try again.

reading_cooldown_summary.message: Rate limit reached. Active Reading pauses for $1 seconds.

focus_sub_blocked.message: This page is not in Safe Zone.

focus_micro_text.message: I see you are trying to come back üôÇ Be gentle: return to Safe Zone, or request 60s with control.

focus_phase_work_end_msg.message: Work session finished. Take a break.

focus_phase_break_end_msg.message: Ready to get back to work?

opt_notif_desc.message: Test and configure system notifications for Focus mode.

opt_notif_sent.message: Notification sent! Check your system tray.

opt_notif_guide_2.message: Focus Assist: Turn OFF or set to Priority only

opt_notif_guide_4.message: Restart: Close and reopen Chrome after changes

opt_notif_test_msg.message: If you see this, notifications are working normally!

opt_ai_pilot_mode_hint.message: Shadow: observe only. Assist: suggest. Primary: auto-act.

opt_nlm_pii_warning_desc.message: Show warning when exporting personal data

popup_subtitle.message: The Neural Nexus for Your Second Brain

bug_guide_example.message:
1. Open YouTube
2. Scroll for 5 minutes
3. No intervention appeared

mem_desc.message: Your reading traces and knowledge exports

mem_weekly_desc.message: Your topic distribution in the last 7 days

mem_empty_desc.message: Start reading and saving highlights to build your memory.

sp_empty_desc.message: Highlight text or select a Quick Action to begin.

sp_retention_no_highlight.message: Please select a section you care about.

sp_teachback_prompt_label.message: Explain it in your own words

sp_nudge_fast_scroll_msg.message: You are scrolling quickly. Want to pause and capture a key idea?

sp_nudge_passive_msg.message: Try to recall the main point you just read.

sp_nudge_completion_msg.message: You are near the end. Want a quick summary or next steps?

focus_review_subtitle.message: Lock in what you just learned

focus_review_hint.message: Write 1-2 sentences. Don‚Äôt check the page.

sp_semantic_cost_warning.message: Enabling this may increase Gemini API usage and cost. Continue?

sp_semantic_key_required.message: Add your API key in Settings to enable this.

sp_semantic_needs_embeddings.message: Semantic Search works best with Embeddings on.

sp_deep_angle_hint.message: Generate a deep angle using your recent reading history.

sp_confirm_new_chat.message: Start a new chat? This will keep your history and open a fresh thread.

sp_offline_message.message: No internet connection. Messages will be sent when online.

sp_message_queued.message: Message saved. Will send when online.

sp_error_no_api_key_desc.message: Go to Settings to configure your Gemini API key.

sp_error_empty_response_desc.message: The AI did not return a response. Please try again.

sp_error_network_desc.message: Check your internet connection and try again.

sp_error_unauthorized_desc.message: Your API key is invalid or expired.

sp_error_rate_limit_desc.message: Please wait a moment before trying again.

sp_error_server_desc.message: The AI service is experiencing issues.

sp_error_timeout_desc.message: The request took too long. Please try again.

sp_welcome_desc.message: A tool to help you read deeply and remember longer.

sp_onboard_step1.message: Highlight text you want to explore

sp_onboard_step2.message: Chat with AI to understand deeper

sp_onboard_step3.message: Distill key insights for your notes

sp_guide_highlight_desc.message: Select any text on the webpage. The side panel will automatically detect your selection.

sp_guide_chat_desc.message: Type your question about the highlighted text. AI will help you understand it better.

sp_guide_insight_desc.message: Click "Key Insight" to distill the discussion into a memorable takeaway.

sp_guide_save_desc.message: Save insights to your knowledge base or download as markdown notes.

sp_tooltip_first_highlight.message: Great! Now ask a question about this text.

sp_tooltip_first_chat.message: Click "Key Insight" to create a takeaway from this discussion.

sp_tooltip_first_insight.message: Click "Mark as Done" to save and move to the next section.

sp_multitab_warning.message: This article is open in another tab

opt_semantic_section_desc.message: Find related highlights by meaning, not just recency.

opt_semantic_cost_warning.message: Warning: These features may increase Gemini API usage and add a little latency.

opt_semantic_key_required.message: Add your API key to enable these toggles.

opt_semantic_embeddings_desc.message: Creates a semantic fingerprint for each highlight so the app can compare meaning.

opt_semantic_search_desc.message: Uses embeddings to pick the top related highlights within the same domain.

nlm_extension_updated.message: Extension updated. Please refresh the page.

srq_pii_warning.message: This highlight may contain personal information. Please review before saving.
